chapters.title: Chapter 16: Unexpected Absences
chapters.info: Lady Aemlyn Carand, p. 344 (387)—Andoran lady, leader of a strong House that supported Morgase during the Succession. Morgase exiled her from Caemlyn as per Gaebril's suggestion. Elayne hopes that she will still support her, but is not certain she will. See also Carand, Culhan.
